identity.name: Dushanbe Eats
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Dominant (Appetizing) with Dark Mode Support

rules: Use Manrope for all headings to ensure a modern, geometric feel.
Use Inter for all body text for maximum legibility.
Use Caveat sparingly for 'Chef's Choice' or 'Special Offer' tags to add a human touch.
Prices must be prominent and bold (e.g., text-xl font-bold text-primary).

primary.description: Vibrant Orange - Stimulates appetite, high visibility for CTAs.

secondary.description: Fresh Emerald - Used for 'Vegetarian', 'Healthy', and Success states.

accent.description: Bone White - Warm neutral background for sections to avoid clinical white.

rules: NEVER use the primary orange for backgrounds. Use it for Buttons, Prices, and Icons only.
Use the 'Bone White' (#F5F5F0) for secondary section backgrounds to create depth.
Food images must have a subtle shadow, not a hard border.
Success messages (Order Delivered) use Emerald Green.

buttons.secondary: bg-secondary/10 text-secondary hover:bg-secondary/20 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-semibold transition-all

cards.food_item: flex flex-col gap-4 p-4 rounded-2xl bg-white border border-black/5 hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA standards. Use dark gray (#1A1A1A) on white, not pure black.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria_labels: Required for all icon-only buttons (e.g., 'Add to Cart', 'Favorite').

rules: Images must be high resolution and appetizing.
Use 'object-cover' for all image containers to prevent distortion.
Add a subtle gradient overlay (bg-gradient-to-t from-black/60 to-transparent) on images with text overlays.

setup: Ensure 'Manrope' font is imported in index.css or index.html.
implementation_strategy: Start with the Mobile Layout first. The app is primarily for phone users.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the sticky bottom nav on mobile and sidebar on desktop.
Use the 'Card' component from Shadcn but heavily customize it with the 'visual_enhancers' rules (rounded-2xl, soft shadows).
For the Menu, use a sticky category header that slides as the user scrolls.
The Cart should be a slide-over drawer on desktop and a full page or bottom sheet on mobile.
critical_reminders: Do not use generic blue for primary actions. Use the Brand Orange (#FF5500).
Ensure touch targets are at least 44px for mobile users.
Use Skeleton loaders (Shadcn Skeleton) while data is fetching. Never show a blank screen.

general: Avoid 'AI Slop' - generic, centered, boring layouts.
Create depth with z-index and shadows.
Micro-animations are mandatory for every interaction.
Use generous spacing (p-6, p-8) to let the food photos breathe.
universal_guidelines.toasts: Use 'sonner' for all notifications (Order added, Payment success).
